title: setup.py and cmake improvements
body_html:
commit 4ecdc28829ec3cd2d5f0193ee322b64bcacea36d
Author: Edward Z. Yang <ezyang@fb.com>
Date:   Thu Feb 15 23:05:37 2018 -0800

    Test that running built program works; fixes #5151.
    
    Signed-off-by: Edward Z. Yang <ezyang@fb.com>

commit cc67c451d0c2dc1f4dd6b50fcb52d8f17e7cd2d1
Author: Edward Z. Yang <ezyang@fb.com>
Date:   Thu Feb 15 22:07:00 2018 -0800

    Apply CFLAGS and LDFLAGS environment variables to cmake builds.
    
    Signed-off-by: Edward Z. Yang <ezyang@fb.com>

commit 6bbaf437c95bfcf021fef5e96351af0a384a94d1
Author: Edward Z. Yang <ezyang@fb.com>
Date:   Thu Feb 15 17:34:47 2018 -0800

    Document env vars and properly propagate MAX_JOBS down.
    
    Signed-off-by: Edward Z. Yang <ezyang@fb.com>

Signed-off-by: Edward Z. Yang ezyang@fb.com
